62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Hudhaifa:The Prophet (ﷺ) said to the people of Nijran, "I will send you the most trustworthy man." (Every one of) the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ) was looking forward (to be that person). He then sent Abu 'Ubaida

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ أَبِي عُبَيْدَةَ بْنِ الْجَرَّاحِ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The virtues of Abu ‘Ubaida bin Al-Jarrah رضي الله عنه
